name: They Are Not Real (CandyDandyMan, Procyon B)
name_original: They Are Not Real (CandyDandyMan, Procyon B)
description:
Test your moral compass with the thrilling new hit: They Are Not Real! Innocent robot families are roaming around , but you need to get to the next room no matter what it takes. Why do you want to get to the next room? Why are you unable to open doors until you slaughter babies? Play the game to find the answers to these questions… A whole world of homicide is waiting for you just behind that ‘play’ button!

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move,

Mouse to aim,

And click to open fire upon those who would do you no harm!

Any and all feedback is greatly appreciated!
